attributes.action: Bring the cost of car insuance down for young drivers
attributes.additional_details: No one can afford car insurance, it’s a complete joke and people wonder why young drivers are having fake insurance if not no insurance etc, we need insurance companies to be told to bring car insurance down. People are being forced to sell there cars and don’t have any money to pay for insurance
attributes.background: Make it illegal for car insurance companies to over price car insurance and make them the prices they are

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the cost of car insurance for young drivers, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling on the Government to Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies.

We have also published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
